description: gold washed two handled cup; flared circular foot; two segmented slender ribbed stems; ribbed bud style bowl adorned by a garland of ripe fruit; opposed flowers with over extended petals form handles
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

at top of foot, engraved: [Gilbert Marks 1899]; under base, engraved: [1850-1900 Thomas and Sarah Barnett. Knighton Grange, Chichester, Golden Wedding, May 28th from their seven surviving children.]
markings: on upper body of bowl: four marks
text: On May 28th, 1900, the seven surviving children of Thomas and Sarah Barnett of Knighton Grange, Chichester, England presented this two-handled gold-washed cup to their parents as a fiftieth wedding anniversary gift.
title: Loving cup
